content: Attached find the issues while running the DTR on Windows 10. When I tried the URL: http://localhost:3005/register ; I am getting following error: [HPM] Error occurred while trying to proxy request /clients from localhost:3005 to http://localhost:3006 (ECONNREFUSED) (https://nodejs.org/api/errors.html#errors_common_system_errors) DTR_errors.png
